$eref.description: An instance of a hotspot dom.
$eref.title: HotspotDomConfig

___index.description: The index of the hotspot, will be used to order hotspots in the z axis.
___index.title: Index

___color.description: The default background color of the hotspot, in any valide CSS value.
___color.title: Color

___class.description: The class or list of class to add to the hotspot, useful to set CSS to the hotspot by group.
___class.title: Class

___height.description: The height (in HTML referential) of the hotspot. It is used for placing the hotspot according to its center.
___height.title: Height

___width.description: The width (in HTML referential) of the hotspot. It is used for placing the hotspot according to its center.
___width.title: Width

___id.description: The HTML ID to append to this DOM hotspot. This ID is different than the UID one
___id.title: ID

___type.description:
The type of the hotspot. Can be one of :
  • 3d
___type.title: The type of the hotspot

___tags.description: The list of tags associated to the hotspot.
___tags.title: Tags

___interactive.description: Is this hotspot is interactive and eligible to raycast
___interactive.title: Interactive flag

$eref.description: An instance of a hotspot transform.
$eref.title: HotspotTransformConfig

___cursor.description: The cursor to display when the pointer is over the hotspot. Any valid css cursor value can be set.
___cursor.title: Pointer cursor

$eref.description: An instance of a hotspot material.
$eref.title: HotspotMaterialConfig

___video.description: The Video configuration that will be used for the texture.
___video.title: Video configuration

___sprite.description: The Sprite configuration that will be used for the texture.
___sprite.title: Sprite configuration

___transparent.description: Does the texture needs to renderer transparency (like a PNG) ?
___transparent.title: Transparent

___color.description: The color of the hotspot if there is no texture.
___color.title: Color

___side.description: The side of the material. Can be front, back or double. See FORGE.HotspotMaterial.sides constants
___side.title: Side

___image.description: The image configuration that will be used for the texture.
___image.title: Image

___plugin.description: The plugin UID that will provide a texture property.
___plugin.title: Plugin

___facingCenter.description: Is the hotspot (for a flat 3D one) facing the center of the scene (the camera) constantly ? Its rotation will be determined given this facing.
___facingCenter.title: Facing Center

$eref.description: An instance of the hotspot states object.
$eref.title: HotspotStatesConfig

___auto.description: Does the hotspot auto switch to the appropriate state?
___auto.title: Auto

___default.description: The default state name to load
___default.title: Default

$eref.description: An instance of a hotspot animation.
$eref.title: HotspotAnimationConfig

___order.description: The list of tracks UID ot execute. The tracks are executed in the order they are written in this array.
___order.title: Order

$eref.description: An instance of the hotspot events object.
$eref.title: HotspotEventConfig

___onOver.description: The action uids to trigger on over.
___onOver.title: On Over

___onClick.description: The action uids to trigger on click.
___onClick.title: On Click

___onOut.description: The action uids to trigger on out.
___onOut.title: On Out

___fx.description: The UID of the special effect (FX) to apply to the hotspot.
___fx.title: FX to apply

___autoScale.description: Does the hotspot auto changes its scale when the fov change?
___autoScale.title: Auto Scale

$eref.description: An instance of a hotspot geometry configuration.
$eref.title: HotspotGeometryConfig

___options.description: The options of the geometry, specific and different for each geometry. See the list of available geometry above and their list of parameters.
___options.title: Options

___type.description:
The type of geometry to create. There are all derivate of THREE.JS geometries. Available values are :
  • plane for PlaneBufferGeometry
  • box for BoxBufferGeometry
  • sphere for SphereBufferGeometry
  • cylinder for CylinderBufferGeometry
  • shape for ShapeBufferGeometry
___type.title: Type
